materials: Glue & Adhesives; Antifreeze; Compact Fluorescent Lights; Degreasers; Fertilizer; Fluorescent Lamps/Tubes; Fungicides; Gasoline and Unwanted Fuels; Herbicides; Household Cleaners; Insecticides; Mercury Containing Items; Ni-Cd Batteries; Other Batteries; Unused Paint; Paint Thinner; Pesticides; Photography Chemicals; Pool Chemicals; Batteries (Rechargeable); Solvents
notes: This event will also accept lithium batteries, lead-based paint, varnish, and sealants. This event is open to the residents of Amherst, Brookline, Hollis, Hudson, Litchfield, Merrimack, Milford, Mont Vernon, Nashua, Pelham, and Windham.  This event will allow a limited number of residents, from non-participating communities, to drop-off wastes during their collection for emergency situations only and with approval by the department. Call the organizer prior to the collection date. There is a ten gallon or twenty pound limit on all waste items.
